mapper.select: SELECT file_path goodsAccessory FROM sdic_inner_auction_file WHERE driving_no = #{drivingNo} AND file_id = 4 limit 1

SELECT siap.id , siap.`order` order1, siap.driving_no, siap.img_path, siap.img_type, siap.is_delete, siap.create_time FROM sdic_inner_auction_photo siap WHERE siap.driving_no = #{drivingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND siap.is_delete =0 ORDER BY siap.`order`

SELECT concat(sia.driving_brand," ",sia.driving_model) as carInfo , sia.displacement as displacement, sia.gearbox_type as gearboxType, sias.order_number as orderNumber, sias.joint_price as jointPrice, sias.deal_type as dealType, sias.deal_date as dealDate, sias.order_state as orderState FROM car_pm_auction_set sias LEFT JOIN car_pm_auction sia ON sias.auction_id = sia.id WHERE sias.is_history='0'
AND sias.is_delete =#{deleteTag}
AND sias.order_state = '50'
AND sias.order_state = '51'
AND sias.order_state in ('50','51')
AND sias.member_code = #{memberCode}
ORDER BY sias.deal_date DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM car_pm_auction_set sias LEFT JOIN car_pm_auction sia ON sias.auction_id = sia.id WHERE sias.is_history='0'
AND sias.is_delete =#{deleteTag}
AND sias.order_state = '50'
AND sias.order_state = '51'
AND sias.order_state in ('50','51')
AND sias.member_code = #{memberCode}
ORDER BY sias.deal_date DESC

SELECT sias.starting_price as startingPrice, sias.auction_cash_deposit as auctionCashDeposit, sias.commission as commission, sias.other_price as otherCost, sias.auction_start_time as auctionStartTime, sias.auction_end_time as auctionFinishTime, sias.interval_time as intervalTime, sias.order_state as state, sias.id as id FROM car_pm_auction_set sias WHERE sias.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE car_pm_auction_set set auction_end_time = date_add( auction_end_time, interval #{delaySecond} second) WHERE ID = #{orderId}
